item.title: Vimpv
item.description: Vimpv is a javascript plugin for Vimperator which allows you to follow/open video urls with mpv. Tested on Youtube and Vimeo. Usage: The default key map is ;m You can map the default key to something else, for example, if you don’t use the mark command, you can map it to m in your ~/.vimperatorrc: nmap m ;m You can find the plugin in my dotfiles repo: https://github.com/spcmd/dotfiles/blob/master/vimperator/.vimperator/plugin/vimpv.js

item.title: ignotifier-setbadge
item.description: Since the Gmail Notifier (ignotifier) addon doesn’t allow us to change its icon badge color (and it cannot be styled via css), I made a simple bash script which allows us to change those colors. You can the find the script and the documentation on github: https://github.com/spcmd/ignotifier-setbadge

item.title: Firefox > mpv
item.description: Simple bash script for opening youtube videos and other videos in mpv from Firefox & log watched videos (into a local html file), if you want. Currently the logging option works only with Youtube and Vimeo videos. Update (2015.04.20.): added auto stop/play Spotify options. You can find the documentation and the instructions on the Github page: https://github.com/spcmd/firefox-mpv
